list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add accent style to sort menu button
Updated the sort options dropdown to include an accent button style. This enhances the visual consistency and user interface aesthetics of the Student Management System. Also made minor adjustments to breakpoints and workspace configurations for better debugging and consistency.

task.summary:
Add sorting functionality and update UI elements
Implemented the sorting functionality for student records allowing sorting by surname and birthdate. Updated the placement of the database connection button and status frame to improve UI layout. Modified breakpoint lines in the workspace configuration for better debugging.

Add sorting functionality for student records
Implemented sorting by surname (A-Z, Z-A) and birthdate in the student management system. Enhanced the user interface with a dropdown menu for sorting options, and integrated the sorting logic into the data fetching function. Updated workspace configuration to reflect these changes.

Add accent style to sort menu button
Updated the sort options dropdown to include an accent button style. This enhances the visual consistency and user interface aesthetics of the Student Management System. Also made minor adjustments to breakpoints and workspace configurations for better debugging and consistency.

MESSAGE.value: finally implemented the sort button lol
